result.execSummary:
The defendant Alma L Rodriguez Pena was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate w/o Valid License(2nd w/in3 Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant shall, within three (3) days, contact the Washington County Jail for purposes of supplying a biological specimen for DNA analysis.
Court costs and fees shall be paid at a rate of $25 per month commencing 3-01-17 and the first of each month thereafter until paid in full or judgment shall be entered for nonpayment.

records.addlTxt: Washington County Sheriff's Department Jail Disposition of Prisoners
Washington County Sheriff's Department Jail Disposition of Prisoners

Def appeared in person.  Atty Sandra Jo Giernoth for State.  Interpreter appearing in person:  Bruce Goodman.  Pretrial held and agreement reached.  Defendant continues to waive right to counsel.  Guilty plea entered.  Court finds defendant guilty and proceeds to sentencing.
Per request of Defendant, 1-30-17 Hearing rescheduled to 2-09-17 at 11:30 a.m.  Interpreter will be needed.
1-18-17 Plea hearing rescheduled to 1-30-17 at 11:30 a.m. to allow interpreter to be present with Defendant.
Not to drive any motor vehicle.
Plea hearing on January 18, 2017 at 08:15 am.

Def appears in person in custody.  Atty Mark David Bensen for State.  Clerk: CP.  Def states she missed last hearing due to not receiving notice.  Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights; probable cause previously found.  Court informs Defendant of DNA expungement rights.  Def does not have valid DL.  Court sets $500 signature bond.  Statements from def's fiance.  Def waives right to counsel to hold pretrial; Court accepts waiver.  Adj to allow pretrial.  Plea hearing scheduled for January 18, 2017 at 08:15 am.
